ModMetaData.name: Ash's Chainsaw Hand
ModMetaData.author: Flammable
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the infamous chainsaw hand, of Evil Dead II and Army of Darkness fame. Good for tearing up demons, on medieval planets and Urbworlds alike. - Research prosthetics. - Craft the chainsaw hand at a machining table. - Perform surgery and replace a hand with the chainsaw prosthetic. - Use as needed.
The chainsaw hand will also speed up plant work. For Rimworld Version 1.4 and 1.5.
Code, sprites done by Flammable. (Me)
